item.title: 6 Awesome Uncrowded National Parks
item.description:
Plan a trip to Yellowstone or Yosemite and you’re likely to see as many humans as animals, try one of the hidden treasures our NPS offers instead.

Source: 6 Awesome Uncrowded National Parks

item.title: Seeing Theory
item.description:
A visual introduction to probability and statistics.

Source: Seeing Theory

item.title: Sideways Dictionary
item.description:
Sideways dictionary — it’s like a dictionary, but using analogies instead of definitions. Use it as a tool for finding and sharing helpful analogies to explain technological ideas. Because if everyone understands technology better, we can make technology work better for everyone.

Source: Sideways Dictionary
